element.data.fire.name: Fire
element.data.fire.description: Entities with Fire Resistance are Not Affected by effects with Red mana cost (except for Attack and Block effects). Attack Phase: All Fire Attacks against Enemies with Fire Resistance will be Inefficient (Divided by 2). Block Phase: Fire Attacks can only be efficiently Blocked by Frost or Chaos Blocks. All other Blocks are Inefficient (Divided by 2). Follower Resistance: Fire Attacks against Followers with Fire Resistance will first be Reduced by Armor before Damage is computed.
